name: Sticky Numbers 3D
description:
Sticky Numbers is a casual puzzle game. In the game, you need to move left and right to gather the small squares scattered on the road. The larger the number on the small squares, the faster the bullet will be launched. Only enough small squares can have a huge firepower net and eliminate the blocks on the road. Of digital pillars. You also need to avoid obstacles, avoid digital blocks being destroyed, and keep your firepower strong enough.

How to play:
1. Swipe the screen left and right to control the movement of the digital square
2. The sprayed number cubes will be glued together
3. The more numbers in a column, the faster the bullet will be fired
4. Find a suitable digital pillar to make a breakthrough
5. Pay attention to avoid obstacles and protect digital cubes
6, reasonable stacking of digital squares
7. Destroy all digital pillars to win

Game features:
1. Leisure and puzzle
2. Hands-on and brainstorming
3. Super cool barrage experience
4. Cool art design
5. Completely free 3D game

We look forward to receiving your feedback! Please leave your comment so that we can continue to make the game better.
